reviewText: Experience the magic of Christmas by traveling through the small town of McAdenville, North Carolina.  Find out how this quiet mill town turns into Christmas Town USA every December. Host Ken Conrad takes you on a journey that discovers how this tradition got started and introduces you to William J. Pharr, the man responsible for keeping the lights burning. This documentary will let you join the local residents in celebrating the annual Yule Log Ceremony, which is a tradition that's older then the lights themselves. Christmas Town USA will truly be a treasure in your holiday DVD collection.
